Articles.Content: We know that starting form 1.4, some parts are depreciate. Should we also assume it's going to be the case for all "new-replace-old" parts? In other words, the parts that have new parts introduced in 1.5 will be depreciated too, as in 1.4 parts?

They are still in the game, just hidden. (So old crafts don't get deleted.)

At some point they may he removed completely but so far none have.

Also, maybe not the right place for this? More of a gameplay question or development suggestion?
